home.title: The Culture of
home.subtitle: Discover the art, history, and spirit of Ultra culture worldwide. From the terraces of Milan to the stands of Casablanca.
home.globalMovementText: From Europe to Africa, South America to Asia, Ultra culture unites millions of passionate supporters.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.subtitle: Become part of the global Ultra community. Share stories, discover groups, and celebrate the culture.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A platform dedicated to preserving and celebrating Ultra culture worldwide.
about.missionText: MOUVEMENT exists to document, preserve, and share the rich cultural heritage of Ultra groups across the globe. We believe in the artistic, cultural, and social value of supporter culture.
about.valuesText: We focus on the cultural, artistic, and educational aspects of Ultra culture. We do not promote or condone violence, hatred, or political extremism.
about.teamText: MOUVEMENT is built by passionate supporters who believe in the positive aspects of Ultra culture.
about.contactText: Have questions, suggestions, or want to contribute? We'd love to hear from you.
